name: Ayayo's Live Affection
overview: Ayayo's Live Affection is the fourth entry in the Hacchake Ayayo-san series. This time Ayayo and Tomoko meet new friends who convince them to participate in the Sex Olympics. The rest of the plot consists of various sexual encounters that constitute this bizarre tournament. Gameplay is nearly non-existent, the player's input being even more sporadic than it is usually the case with visual novels.
